name: reiverr
description: Reiverr is a self-hosted YouTube interface for browsing, searching, and watching videos without ads or tracking. It offers subscriptions and playlists in a minimal UI.
features: Ad-free viewing: Watch YouTube videos without advertisements or tracking scripts.
Subscription management: Follow channels and receive updates without a Google account.
Playlist support: Create and organize custom playlists for your favorite content.
Privacy focused: Browse and watch videos without exposing your viewing habits to YouTube.
Minimal interface: Clean, distraction-free UI optimized for content consumption.
Search functionality: Find videos across YouTube without algorithmic recommendations.
Video downloads: Save videos locally for offline viewing or archival purposes.
Comment viewing: Read video comments without logging into YouTube.
Mobile responsive: Watch videos comfortably on smartphones and tablets.
Proxy support: Route requests through your own server to avoid regional restrictions.
Custom themes: Switch between light and dark modes for comfortable viewing.
Self-hosted control: Maintain complete ownership of your viewing data and preferences.
